### Importation des librairies

```{r import}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

library(gapminder)
library(hrbrthemes)

gapminder %>%
  filter(year=="1952") %>%
  filter(gdpPercap<90000)%>%
  ggplot( aes(x=gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color=continent, size=pop)) + geom_point()

```
